docs.title: Farming Fortune
docs.text:
Info

☘ Farming Fortune is a stat that affects a player's chance to get more crops.

docs.title: Extra Farming Fortune Perk - Up to +60☘
Garden Farming Fortune Account Upgrade - Up to +40☘
Crop Upgrades - Up to +45☘ for each crop
Personal Best - Up to 100☘ per crop
Accessories
docs.text:
• Fermento Artifact 30☘
    • +30☘ when breaking crops

It Cost 8x Condensed Fermento and 1x Squash Ring

Anita's Artifact ☘ is temporary and only apply to one crop during a jacob contest.

  • Anita's Artifact 25☘
    • +25☘ on a random crop during a jacob's contest.

It cost 2x Gold Medal, 100x Jacob's Ticket and 1x Anita's Ring

docs.title: Fermento Armor (¾)
docs.text:
• Base Bonus 100☘
  • Feast Ability 50☘
  • Enchants 15☘
    • Pesterminator V - +15☘
  • Reforge 90☘
    • Mossy (Overgrown Grass) - +90☘ (MYTHIC)

docs.title: Rancher's Boots
docs.text:
• Base bonus 60☘ (if Farming 60)
  • Enchants 15☘
    • Pesterminator V - +15☘
  • Reforge 25☘
    • Mossy (Overgrown Grass) - +25☘ (LEGENDARY)

docs.title: Per Piece
docs.text:
• Base bonus 5☘
  • Effects
    • Salesperson 15☘
      • +1☘/Garden visitor Served Milestone (max 5000)
  • Enchants 19.75☘
    • Green Thumb +19.75☘
  • Reforge 10☘
    • Rooted (Burrowing Spores) - +10☘ (EPIC)

docs.title: All Piece
docs.text:
• Base bonus 50☘
  • Effects
    • Salesperson 60☘
      • +1☘/Garden visitor Served Milestone (max 5000)
  • Enchants +79☘
    • Green Thumb +79☘
  • Reforge 40☘
    • Rooted (Burrowing Spores) - +40☘ (EPIC)

docs.title: Crop Upgrade
docs.text:
Gain +5☘ per level.

Up to +45☘ Farming Fortune at level 9.

It will cost you 7,685 Coppers per crop and require Garden XV to be maxed.

docs.title: Extra Farming Fortune Perk
docs.text:
Gain +4☘ Farming Fortune per Level.

Up to +60☘ Farming fortune at level 15.

It will cost you 66 Gold Medals and 3750 jacob's tickets.

docs.title: Garden Farming Fortune Account Upgrade
docs.text:
Only apply in the Garden.

Gain +4☘ Farming Fortune per level. Up to +40☘ Farming Fortune

Every level is free, but it will take you 146 days to max it.

docs.title: Garden Plot
docs.text:
Gain +3☘ Farming Fortune for each plot unlocked.

Up to to +72☘ Farming Fortune.

It will cost you 12,103 Composts and require Garden 7 to be maxed.

docs.title: Misc
docs.text:
• Exportable Carrots 12☘ (Only for CARROTS)
    • 3,000x Exportable Carrots
  • Expired Pumpkin 12☘ (Only for PUMPKIN)
    • 3,000x Expired Pumpkin

docs.title: Personal Best
docs.text:
• Wheat Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 1,000 - 1,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Carrot Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 3,000 - 3,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Potato Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 3,000 - 3,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Pumpkin Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 1,000 - 1,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Melon Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 5,000 - 5,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Mushroom Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 1,000 - 1,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Cactus Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 2,000 - 2,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Sugar Cane Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 2,000 - 2,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Nether Wart Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 3,000 - 3,000,000 Crops Needed
  • Cocoa Beans Max 100☘
    • +0.1☘ per 3,000 - 3,000,000 Crops Needed

docs.title: Pets Item
docs.text:
Gain +4☘ Farming Fortune per Garden Level.

Up to +60☘ Farming Fortune at Garden Level XV

docs.title: Pets
docs.text:
• Legendary Elephant 180☘
    • +1.8☘/Level - Up to +180☘ With Level 100
  • Legendary Mooshroom Cow 216.9
    • Base fortune +170☘
    • +0.7 ☘ per 20 Strength❁ (1390❁)

docs.title: Skills Level
docs.text:
Gain +4☘ Farming Fortune for each level you have in your Farming Skill.

Up to +240☘ Farming Fortune

docs.title: Tools
docs.text:
Tools List

  • Wheat
  • Carrot
  • Potato
  • Sugar Cane
  • Nether Wart

Counter and Analysis Theorical maximum are

  • +240☘ For Logarithmic Counter
  • +120☘ For Collection Analysis

It would take you over a billion years of 24/7 farming at a constant 20BPS to achieve that.
